TopicTitle: Compact crew transporting rough terrain vehicle MK.4 (CCTRV4)

Articles.Content:
I'm keeping the description brief, try it out for your self!

I tried to go for an Apollo themed rover.

-It has a landing leg on top to flip the rover in case the rover flips over

-2 seats

-headlights

-2 radioisotope thermonuclear generators (RTGs)

-4 basic solar panels

-3 Z-400 batteries(radial mounted big batteries)

-1 Z-100 battery(radial mounted small battery

-1 probe

-22 parts

I recommend when driving, to disable torque on the probe(on the bottom of the rover) and disable the motors for the front wheels.

And if you flip over, turn on torque and use the landing leg to try to right side it.

Craft file:http://www./view/w3v3ey2pdu33bgk/IZON_rover_4.craft

Capable of climbing steep angles

In case of a roll-over, It uses it's torque and landing leg to right side itself.

Finally made it to Eeloo, perform nicely.

Rolling through the night.
